page.title: 08HOUSES
page.content: In Durness there is a mixture of housing types. There are traditional stone built houses, council housing and a few modern bungalows. At Druim Bhlar council houses were built in the early 1970's on bog land .They are unsuitable houses for this area and are beginning to subside .Recently there have been two modern kit houses built.One of them is being built by my Dad in Sangomore .He built the foundations himself .Some men from Roy Construction of Thurso came to put up the timber frame.He put up the outside wall himself .Some time after that Roy Construction came back with things for the inside of the house .Dad has put up the tiles and found out that he was two rows short .He is now doing the inside of the house.We hope to have the house finished by the end of the year. {By Iona Macpherson,aged 9
